source:
%%sql
-- DBXDH.DHT_BUILDING definition
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.DHT_BUILDING  (	
	BUILDING_KEY INTEGER NOT NULL,
	BUILDING_VERSION INT NOT NULL,
	BUILDING_BUSINESS_ID STRING,
	CAMPUS_ID STRING NOT NULL,
	BUILDING_ID STRING NOT NULL,
	BUILDING_NAME STRING,
	BUILDING_STATUS STRING NOT NULL,
	BUILDING_OWNERSHIP_ID STRING,
	BUILDING_OWNERSHIP_NAME STRING,
	BUILDING_OWNERSHIP_DESCR STRING,
	PRIMARY_BUILDING_USE_ID STRING,
	PRIMARY_BUILDING_USE_NAME STRING,
	PRIMARY_BUILDING_USE_DESCR STRING,
	SECONDARY_BUILDING_USE_ID STRING,
	SECONDARY_BUILDING_USE_NAME STRING,
	SECONDARY_BUILDING_USE_DESCR STRING,
	RENTABLE_AREA INTEGER,
	BUILDING_ACTIVATION_YEAR INTEGER,
	BUILDING_INACTIVATION_YEAR INTEGER,
	PROCESSED_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	CURRENT_IND	STRING
,	EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP
,	REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP
,	REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP
,	SOURCE_SYSTEM STRING
,	REC_CHECKSUM STRING
,	REC_STATUS STRING	
,	IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP
,	IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP
,   ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND STRING
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)
LOCATION 'abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/dimensions/DHT_BUILDING'

-- RESOWW.BUILDING definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE RESOWW.BUILDING;

CREATE TABLE RESOWW.BUILDING (
	BUILDING_KEY INTEGER NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_ID CHAR(8) NOT NULL,
	BUILDING_ID CHAR(6) NOT NULL,
	BUILDING_NAME VARCHAR(150),
	BUILDING_STATUS VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
	BUILDING_OWNERSHIP_ID CHAR(2),
	BUILDING_OWNERSHIP_NAME VARCHAR(32),
	BUILDING_OWNERSHIP_DESCR VARCHAR(256),
	PRIMARY_BUILDING_USE_ID CHAR(2),
	PRIMARY_BUILDING_USE_NAME VARCHAR(64),
	PRIMARY_BUILDING_USE_DESCR VARCHAR(512),
	SECONDARY_BUILDING_USE_ID CHAR(3),
	SECONDARY_BUILDING_USE_NAME VARCHAR(64),
	SECONDARY_BUILDING_USE_DESCR VARCHAR(512),
	RENTABLE_AREA INTEGER,
	BUILDING_ACTIVATION_YEAR SMALLINT,
	BUILDING_INACTIVATION_YEAR SMALLINT,
	PROCESSED_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT SQL200724134512910 PRIMARY KEY (BUILDING_KEY)
);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX SQL200724134512900 ON RESOWW.BUILDING (BUILDING_KEY);
